comments_since_last_sample.body: Oh my, oh my men need to wake up.

The game is severely lopsided in favor of women, so men are leaving the game.  Thank the movement, the courts, and big daddy government because they have replaced the "real" men women claim they don't need anyway.

men have realised that every thing good they do they get payed in negativity in this cursed world so they stop and live their own life, you people who are deceived by the devil you can do whatever you want to do just don't apolige or cry when you realise you were wrong on judgement day!

I think what we need to do is allow our young men to be able to speak their feelings. Yes we need our boys to be men, but we were raised by men who weren’t thought how to speak their feelings. You know who a man cries to? A woman he loves. You need to talk more about degeneracy. That is what is making young men worse.

They stopped hunting, fishing, and working on cars. They now wear flip flops and play video games. But don't worry, they are still a few of us left out here. Strong men are good men! We try to do what's best for our families. And we will stop anything bad from happening to a lady. We still open doors for women. This country will go down without us!! Don't forget that.
